All our: All our products have successfully passed tests in accredited laboratories and are certified by the Agency for Standardization, Metrology and Certification 'Uzstandard'. 'Global Petrochemical Group' is your reliable partner in ensuring the durability and reliability of your car.
используем: At «Global Petrochemical Group» LLC, we use the most modern solutions in the production of containers and product bottling. Our high-tech automated lines ensure accuracy, uniformity, and efficiency at each stage.
Линии: Bottling lines developed by leading global manufacturers ensure high speed and filling accuracy from 1 to 10 kilograms, with a capacity of up to 15 tons per hour. Our innovative infrastructure guarantees stable quality and reliability.
ведущий: Global Petrochemical Group LLC is a leading manufacturer of motor oils, coolants and auto chemicals in Uzbekistan.
UzTR: We are proud that our products comply with the requirements of UzTR 783-024:2017 and are approved for use in vehicles.
reliable: «Global Petrochemical Group» is your reliable partner in car protection.

name: name
Компания ООО: The company OOO «Global Petrochemical Group» was founded in 2011 in Tashkent. The company is the leader in the market of Uzbekistan in the field of production of motor oils, cooling liquids and auto chemicals, taking into account world standards.
Все этапы: All stages of production (including production of goods) are carried out on our own technological equipment. High quality control is carried out at each stage of production.
Продукция: The products of the company OOO «Global Petrochemical Group» fully comply with all necessary standards.
успешно: The company has successfully passed tests in the relevant laboratories and has test reports, and also has certification from the Agency for Standardization, Metrology and Certification «Uzstandard» and has received approval for production and use in vehicles according to UzTR 783-024:2017.
2023 году: In 2023, the company LLC «Global Petrochemical Group» carried out a complete replacement of equipment in the polyethylene materials workshop. Equipment with automatic flash trimming was installed. The equipment is equipped with the latest MOOG systems, which allow controlling the uniform thickness of the container walls.
Высокотехнологичные: High-tech container molds with automatic flash trimming and highly efficient cooling enable the production of high-quality containers. High-speed automatic filling lines from Jiangsu Tom Intelligent Equipment Co., Ltd have been installed, allowing the filling of containers from 1 to 10 kilograms with a capacity of up to 15 tons per hour per line. Barrel filling lines with a filling speed of 45 seconds and IBC cube filling lines have also been installed.
company works: The GPG company works in collaboration with the world's largest company, S-Oil Corporation, South Korea, which is among the top five global leaders in the production of lubricants for all types of light and heavy motor vehicles.
Advanced: Advanced Lubrication & Coolant Technology by GPG
develops: GPG develops and manufactures high-performance engine oils and antifreezes using advanced formulation technologies. Our products are engineered to deliver powerful engine protection, thermal stability, and smooth driving comfort in all conditions.
At GPG: At GPG, our vision is to help the world run more smoothly through advanced technology. We are committed to developing high-quality lubricants and chemical solutions that reduce friction, minimize noise, and improve energy efficiency across a wide range of applications. Through continuous innovation and the development of cutting-edge chemical technologies, we aim to set new industry standards and become a trusted global benchmark in performance and quality.
To make: To make the world run smoothly with technology.
Setting: Setting Uzbekistan’s new standard in lubricants and chemicals.
Leveraging: Leveraging state-of-the-art technology, we strive to deliver the highest levels of satisfaction, efficiency, and performance for our customers’ vehicles and equipment.

believe: We believe collaboration drives innovation and success. Our Partner Program fosters strong, mutually beneficial relationships, enhancing market insights and delivering exceptional value to clients globally.

trusted: GPG is a trusted partner to global decision-makers in over 90 countries, delivering excellence, reliability, and industry-leading performance.
strategic: As your strategic growth partner, we provide exclusive access to proprietary research, industry insights, and collaborative opportunities, driving measurable impact. Partnering with us ensures access to high-quality, original data that fuels business growth and market expansion.
